name: Relate
headline: All-in-One Sales and Marketing CRM for B2B teams
description: Relate is a modern Sales and Marketing CRM platform for B2B companies.

founders.name: SJ (Sangyong) Jung, Founder
founders.description: SJ (CEO) was the co-founder and co-CEO of Sentbe (2015-2018), a fintech company offering cross-border money transfer services. At Sentbe, SJ built the first product and led the product team during the early stages. Today, Sentbe is valued at over $100M. With a background as a full-stack developer and experience in UX, SJ specializes in building small, high-performing product teams.

founders.name: Arthur (Hyun June) Kim, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder @Relate
Previously Sales and Product Lead @Opensurvey

generated_description:
### Relate: The All-in-One Sales and Marketing CRM for B2B Teams

**Overview:**
Relate is a modern Sales and Marketing CRM, designed specifically for B2B teams. Founded in 2019 and part of the Y Combinator S22 batch, it has its roots in San Francisco, where a lean team of seven is making waves in the SaaS space.

**Mission:**
Their mission is succinct: provide an all-in-one platform that covers all customer data, allowing teams to engage with clients, track deals, and collaborate seamlessly.

**Key Features:**
Relate’s user experience is straightforward yet robust. Users benefit from a clean interface that encourages productivity. The platform allows for streamlined tracking of potential leads, customer interactions, and team collaboration—all in one place.

**Target Market and Positioning:**
With a clear focus on startups and early-stage businesses, particularly those frustrated by the complexity of well-known CRMs like Salesforce, Relate offers a simpler, more intuitive alternative.

**Testimonials:**
Users have praised Relate for its efficient pipeline feature, ease of use, and adaptability during scaling processes. Clients like Bryan Houlton, CEO & Co-founder of Manatee, highlight how it has saved their team countless hours.

**Current Status:**
The product is gaining traction and has garnered positive feedback, evident from its growing customer base. With insights from analytics on customer health and upcoming renewals, Relate aims to redefine sales and customer success for B2B SaaS startups.

**Conclusion:**
If you’re part of a B2B team looking for a no-nonsense solution to manage sales and marketing operations, Relate positions itself as an appealing choice with its clean design and all-encompassing features. 

For more information, you can visit their website: [Relate](https://www.relate.so/).
